string.name: splash_text
string.font: This app finds and displays signal strength information from Bluetooth, Cellular, Wifi networks that you phone can see. \nBehind the scenes network settings are accessed and altered -
therefore only use this app at your own risk and after understanding app notes below. \n
\nApp Notes: \n-During scanning, bluetooth is turned on; after scanning bluetooth is turned off.
This app will therefore disconnect bluetooth devices;
additionally, only "discoverable" Bluetooth devices are found.

\n-Scanning only finds Cell networks linked to your SIM and therefore represents a fraction of true sum signal. \n-During Wifi scanning, Wifi is repeatedly turned on and off to help get results quicker.
THIS WILL INTERRUPT ANY WIFI ACTIVITIES DURING TIME OF USE.
\n-This app only works on newer phones.
